text: The Dream Team is a 1989 American comedy-drama movie directed by Howard Zieff and starring Michael Keaton, Christopher Lloyd, Peter Boyle, Stephen Furst, Lorraine Bracco, Milo O'Shea, Larry Pine, Jack Duffy, Philip Bosco, Michael Lembeck, Lizabeth MacKay and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1989 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy- drama movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Zieff
title: The Dream Team (movie)
